# Task

Export or copy a bibtex database from your own electronic library and insert
references in your document [Species Description](../species-description).
On this task you can expand the content of your document.

# Alternative

You can also insert references in your document [Describing
Vegetation-Plots](../describe-vegtable).

# Trained Skills

- Advanced knowledge about the use of RMarkdown for reporting scientific results
- Management of electronic libraries and citation styles
